item.title: Requests to players who host games
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded: plz cut and paste your server log into this post so we can track down those nasty end game bugs

item.title: Feedback and message for isocryd
item.author: invalid@example.com ([RLF]Beowulf)
item.dc:creator: [RLF]Beowulf
item.content:encoded:
First of all USkaarj team: Awesome work. It's truely genious what you pulled off, turning a FPS into a RTS game. It'd be a shame to see USkaarj for UT discontinued because of UT2003/2004. But maybe you let other
people make mods for the original UT based on the USkaarj code?

The interface is cool and I'm accustomed with it after having tried things out for a few minutes.
The whole mod looks superb IMHO.

I wasn't able to start a game with isocryd who fortunately...

Feedback and message for isocryd

item.title: USkaarj Doesnt Work!
item.author: invalid@example.com (bot-1)
item.dc:creator: bot-1
item.content:encoded: Ok I installed the uskaarj.zip and i opened the umod and it said it was extracting but i cant find any of the files for it in ut 2003. I think it's trying to install it into c drive but mine is installed into e drive. HELP!!!!

item.title: once again
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)

item.content:encoded:
Ok...How obut being able ot build walls..as much as i love turrets...walls would help sometimes.

close combatt troops..i know range is cool..but turrets cant hit range soemtimes cause thery're too far away..maybe decrease range of troops or increase range fo turrets?

suggestions

item.title: more

item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded:
titans are slow as hell, in AOE monks are slow,but in AOE they had all units move as fast as the slowest one in the group,i think that may help when moving queens that are with titans.

i was thinking..this could go retail if you fixed a bit. im sure some company wants a RTS in this engine


im actually wondeirng about if your adidng fog of war
and the like, i dont htink it'll fit with this game seeign as its 3d. Yet if it worked twould be major cool.

This has been quickly copied...

item.title: Zooming.
item.author: invalid@example.com (jasdave)
item.dc:creator: jasdave
item.content:encoded:
Just one suggestion-
Can the speed for zomming in and out be increased?
I guess this isthe moving forward/backward, closer to the ground.

item.title: problems in the ini
item.author: invalid@example.com (jasdave)
item.dc:creator: jasdave
item.content:encoded:
Ok, I decided to edit my ini to see if the command for build was there, (possibley invisibly binded to another key). It wasn't there at all. The key I repeatedly tried to bind it to was B (shown in blue).
Another thing I saw was that Uskaarj.ini took alot of keys from other mods. (shown in red)These are useless in Uskaarj and maybe causing the bugs.
Shown below are some of the commands taken from other mods ini.
Note: there are many more commands in there from INF and UT. Notice grab, an...

problems in the ini

item.title: Comments and stuff on the Beta release
item.author: invalid@example.com (Mr.Mitchell)
item.dc:creator: Mr.Mitchell
item.content:encoded:
First of all, it's a very nice mod but it obviously still needs some work. Here are the points I have:

- Zooming over the map works OK most of the time, but it only seemed to work on my own buildings and on the tyridium.

- This game really needs a manual that describes the possibilities. I had barnEbiss telling me how to group units and how to zoom the map and how to move around, but he will probably not always be around

- I need some tooltips on the icons in the lower right...

Comments and stuff on the Beta release

item.title: fixed bugs list
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Fixed* debug messages no longer roll over the screen
Fixed* server browser now only pings Uskaarj servers
Fixed* being able to bind keys


we are now working on

End game bug
Adding in Mouse scroll speed adjustable setting


we will be releaseing small updates that at first fix game play, then after that the updates will add new stuff in

As soon as the last two things are done we are working on for the update, we will release the update

item.title: Build Menu
item.author: invalid@example.com (InvisiboBU)
item.dc:creator: InvisiboBU
item.content:encoded: I just downloaded and installed USkaarj and when I try to play it I can't activate the Build menu so when I went to check the controls I noticed Unreal got rid of the key I had bound to it. I rebound it again and it still unbound it. What do I type in the USkaarjUser.ini to bind the key to the menu?

item.title: First impressions...
item.author: invalid@example.com (livingtarget)
item.dc:creator: livingtarget
item.content:encoded:
It's sweet to play, although the bugs don't make it very enjoyable.
bugs. Maybe it's rushed a bit i dunno...

->debug messages roll over the screen about bots finding direct paths etc. It drives me crazy
->you have to built a thing before you know what it is
->most menu's are kinda messed up...
->who the f#ck decided to remove the UT commands? Especially the admin commands, I mean "hello!" how would you like me to switch maps ingame without restarting the server

->i want a...

First impressions...

item.title: suggestions
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)
item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded:
Just a few, to give it more of a feel IMHO:
1: Try to give us a mini-map, i went out to find the enemy base and got lost=\
2:know the top down/top onm an angle veiw in other RTS's? If possible I'd love ot see that,if not this veiw is pretty good.3: in the "crossing" map, i couldnt see the type cause the white sky ahd blocked it,and i couldnt pick NEG.

it was fun, tohugh i need to try it on a better server(devi's was laggy, no offence)

I know tis a beta and this mod can only get better.
